name: middlebrow
content:

Middlebrow music, literature, art, and films are of good quality, interesting, and often popular, but can be understood quite easily. Compare
highbrow adjective mainly disapproving
lowbrow mainly disapproving

(of music, literature, art, or film) of good quality, interesting, and often popular, but not needing very much thought to understand
